entry.title: Make Windows 10 Look Like Windows Vista! - Full Tutorial

media:group.media:title: Make Windows 10 Look Like Windows Vista! - Full Tutorial
media:group.media:description:
● Liked this video? Subscribe for more: http://mjd.yt/subscribe
Today I'll be showing you how to make Windows 10 look a lot more like Windows Vista! It's not an exact 1 to 1 recreation, but it is pretty close.
Downloads: Wallpaper: https://i.pinimg.com/originals/21/4c/af/214cafdf60cedf802a22578771aabfef.jpg OpenShell: https://github.com/Open-Shell/Open-Shell-Menu/releases Vista Taskbar Textures: http://www.classicshell.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=6604 Vista Start Orb: http://www.classicshell.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=742 Vista Start Skin: http://www.classicshell.net/forum/viewtopic.php?t=5655 Winaero Tweaker: https://winaero.com/download-winaero-tweaker/ 8GadgetPack: https://8gadgetpack.net/ OldNewExplorer: https://www.majorgeeks.com/files/details/oldnewexplorer.html Vista Icon Pack: https://www.deviantart.com/bonkietje/art/Windows-Vista-Icons-81800328
Chapters: 00:00 - Wallpaper 00:54 - Start Menu 05:43 - Taskbar 06:52 - Start Button 07:53 - Winaero Tweaker 13:00 - Desktop Gadgets 14:56 - Windows Explorer 17:31 - Icons

media:group.media:description:

entry.title: The Story of Google's Failed Smart TV Platform (Google TV)

media:group.media:title: The Story of Google's Failed Smart TV Platform (Google TV)
media:group.media:description:
● Liked this video? Subscribe for more: http://mjd.yt/subscribe
In 2010, Google launched their very first smart TV platform: Google TV. Sony and Logitech pitched in to create both set top boxes and TVs that ran on the platform. But just 4 years later, Google TV was discontinued. So what made this platform a failure? Find out in today's video!
Thrift Store Finds Episode: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PCa7YJ26Xs4

entry.title: Gateway Is BACK! - But Is Their $200 Laptop Any Good?

media:group.media:title: Gateway Is BACK! - But Is Their $200 Laptop Any Good?
media:group.media:description:
For a limited time, get a free trial of Skillshare Premium by signing up through this link: https://skl.sh/michaelmjd10201 This video was sponsored by Skillshare!
● Liked this video? Subscribe for more: http://mjd.yt/subscribe
Gateway is a name that we haven't heard in a while in the world of technology. Founded in 1985 as Gateway 2000, they went on to be one of the most popular computer manufacturers out there. But now, after a long hiatus, they're back! But are their new machines any good? Let's find out!
Gateway's New Site: https://gatewayusa.com/ Walmart Product Page: https://www.walmart.com/cp/gateway/8460364 Ars Technica Article: https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2020/09/we-found-out-who-makes-walmarts-new-gateway-laptops-and-its-bad-news/
